attributes.action: reconsider the decision to increase MPs basic salaries by nearly £1000, at a time when much of the country is still undergoing serious financial hardship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This year MPs across all parties have been dogged by a wide ranging expenses scandal. Unemployment has increased considerably, and some of lowest paid in both the public and private sector have being asked to accept pay freezes, cuts or reduced working hours.

It does not seem acceptable that after such a period, MPs should be reward by a rise of nearly £1000 on their basic salary!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
